alert.note: Alert for Harrison; Mercer; Worth (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 11:09PM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Worth, southern Mercer and northern Harrison Counties through MIDNIGHT CDT... At 1109 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 7 miles northwest of Eagleville, or 14 miles southeast of Mount Ayr, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Princeton, Grant City, Ridgeway, Eagleville, Cainsville, Irena, Blythedale, Mount Moriah, Allendale, Modena, Hatfield and Mill Grove. This includes Interstate 35 in Missouri between mile markers 100 and 113. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for north central and northwestern Missouri.
